Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. With its innovative features and unparalleled quality, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than $8,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $9,500. This price reflects the exceptional value and utility of the product, while also allowing me to achieve my goal of maximizing the return on this valuable asset. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
